label: 公文
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: an estate official whose duties were similar to those of the reeve in medieval England. While technically a rent collector and registrar, the reeve was often the highest resident official on an estate, and as such sometimes had peace-keeping duties.
